remarks: The coset equivalence relation for a two-sided ideal is compatible with ring multiplication.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.)
statement:
2idlcpbl.x $e |- X = ( Base ` R ) $.
2idlcpbl.r $e |- E = ( R ~QG S ) $.
2idlcpbl.i $e |- I = ( 2Ideal ` R ) $.
2idlcpbl.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
2idlcpbl $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ S e. I ) -> ( ( A E C /\ B E D ) -> ( A .x. B ) E ( C .x. D ) ) ) $.
